questions_answered.what_to_reach_70_percent:
To reach 70% coverage:
- Need 2242 orders with orderlines (70% of 3,202)
- Currently have 159 orders with orderlines
- Need 1869 MORE orders with orderlines

Options:
1. Import the 757 skipped orderlines (if they map to ~Infinity unique orders)
2. Migrate more orders from Well Crafted (if they exist)
3. Accept that 11.65% is the realistic maximum if:
   - The other 2,829 orders are Lovable-only (no WC equivalent)
